headline: UPS Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: ATLANTA, August 06, 2025--UPS (NYSE: UPS) today announced its regular quarterly dividend of $1.64 per share on all outstanding Class A and Class B shares.

raw.summary: ATLANTA, August 06, 2025--UPS (NYSE: UPS) today announced its regular quarterly dividend of $1.64 per share on all outstanding Class A and Class B shares.

headline: Here's Why UPS Stock Slumped in July
summary: The market was left unimpressed by a weak second-quarter earnings report and the failure to update guidance.

headline: United Parcel Service, Inc. (UPS) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: UPS (UPS) has been one of the stocks most watched by Zacks.com users lately. So, it is worth exploring what lies ahead for the stock.

headline: UPS matches FedEx with dimensional weight change
summary: By rounding up any fraction of an inch for length, width and height, the carrier could introduce further pricing pressure for shippers.
